lead_paragraph: The referee who was suspended after Oregon was mistakenly awarded possession after an onside kick in a victory against Oklahoma on Saturday will work today’s game between Southern California and Arizona. On Monday, the Pacific-10 Conference suspended the referee of the Oklahoma-Oregon game, Dave Cutaia, and the rest of the seven-man on-field crew for one game. But the suspensions must be staggered so the conference has enough officials to cover its games, the Pac-10 said. Arizona is coached by Mike Stoops, the brother of Oklahoma Coach Bob Stoops.
